greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers with an even arithmetic derivative, cf. A003415.
comment: Union of multiples of 4 and odd numbers with an even number of prime factors with multiplicity. - _Charlie Neder_, Feb 25 2019
After two initial terms (0 and 1), numbers n such that A086134(n) = 2. - _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 30 2019
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 133], EvenQ@ If[Abs@ # < 2, 0, # Total[#2/#1 & @@@ FactorInteger[Abs@ #]]] &] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 30 2019 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 11 2014
